column4: How do you install foreign fonts on linux? Like, the fonts so I can view the characters in a web browser.
could you elaborate more? I'm still new to the linux operating system.
I'm still new to the operating system, the file structure confuses me xD
~/ is you home directory, .fonts is hidden fonts catalog
Yea, I can't seem to find a .fonts folder, only .fontconfig
I'm in the right directory though.
shouldn't it have already have been created from the start?
systemfonts are somewhere in /usr/share so no
alright so its created, what goes in there? TrueTypeFonts?
Nevermind, found an ubuntu wiki page related to fonts, thanks for your help so far!
